description:
Versatile, warm and original, here is the Mistassini Sherpa fleece jacket. Named in honor of this great Quebec River that flows into Lac St-Jean, this jacket is made of 100% recycled polyester Sherpa fleece.

The two chest cargo pockets and two zippered handwarmer pockets give you all the space you need to have everything you need in the field at hand. The Mistassini jacket is also reinforced with polyester under the forearms for added durability. The zipper runs the full length of the jacket and is enhanced with a flap on the inside. Elasticated cuffs to retain heat add comfort and style to the jacket.

This jacket is more than welcome on chilly days and is perfect for everyday wear or a day in the woods.
name: Hooke Mistassini Sherpa Fleece - Mens
